original_title: Embsay & Bolton Abbey Railway – Railway Rally 2021
overview: This set features all running locomotives for the event, including  – Cockerill Type IV Lucie (visiting from the North Yorkshire Moors Railway, and as seen in the TV series, Yorkshire Steam Railway: All Aboard)  – Terrier 2678 (visiting from the Kent and East Sussex Railway)  – Keighley Gasworks No. 2 (visiting from the Tanfield Railway)  – Hunslet Beatrice  – A surprise appearance from the EBAR’s resident Class 08.
title: Embsay & Bolton Abbey Railway – Railway Rally 2021
